BackstoryDef.title: Reichswehr soldat
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Soldat of the Reichswehr.

BackstoryDef.title: Forgeworld soldat
BackstoryDef.description: Growing up on a forge world, [PAWN_nameDef] took pride in every well-engineered equipment—from a humble DP9 pistol to a mighty flagship. Honest, hard-working men and women were building the Reich's future, and [PAWN_pronoun] would protect them at all costs.

BackstoryDef.title: Frontier volunteer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the Reichswehr to support [PAWN_possessive] family on a frontier colony. The Kaiserinreich favored loyal subjects, and [PAWN_pronoun] hoped [PAWN_possessive] home would be safer under Her Majesty’s protection.\n\nLife on the frontier demanded adaptability, and [PAWN_nameDef] had a knack for knocking some sense into the thick skulls of troublemaking, up-to-no-good knuckleheads.

BackstoryDef.title: Frontier veteran
BackstoryDef.description: Originally part of the frontier garrison, [PAWN_nameDef] requested a transfer to the expedition corps, expecting honor and glory in battle. What [PAWN_pronoun] didn't expect was that life in the Reichswehr offered little variety—unless you were part of the specialist corps.
